patthana17.28:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.28:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.28:3.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
